price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߞߣߐߝߋ߲ ߘߌ߫ ، ߊߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߬߸ ߞߊ߯ߙߌߓߊ߯ ߟߴߊ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߕߊ߲߬ߘߏ߬ߕߊ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
